game.name: Catch Flex
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Collect notes, smash blocks, and dodge obstacles in sync with the music. Play using a phone or webcam camera — no VR, no gamepad. Just rhythm and movement.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Collect notes, smash blocks, and dodge obstacles in sync with the music. Play using a phone or webcam camera — no VR, no gamepad. Just rhythm and movement.
